    <script>
        function onSearchSubmit(form) {
            if ($(form).find('.search-input').length > 0) $(form).find('.search-input').val($(form).find('.search-input').val().toLowerCase());
            else if ($(form).find('#search_input').length > 0) $(form).find('#search_input').val($(form).find('#search_input').val().toLowerCase());
            return true;
        }
    </script>

                                    var numLatestArticlesInMenu = 14;

                                    function renderLatestArticlesInMenu() {
                                        var html = '';
                                        if (numLatestArticlesInMenu > 0) {
                                            latestArticlesInMenu.forEach(function (category) {
                                                var elements = category.data;
                                                html += '<div class="hamburger-latest-articles ' + category.slug + '-hamburger-latest-articles">';
                                                html += '   <strong class="box-title">' + category.title + '</strong>';
                                                html += '   <ul>';
                                                elements.forEach(function (item) {
                                                    html += '       <li><a href="' + item.slug + '" title="' + item.title + '">' + item.title + '</a></li>';
                                                });
                                                html += '   </ul>';
                                                html += '</div>';
                                            });

                                        }
                                        return html;
                                    }

                                    $(document).ready(function () {
                                        $('#latestArticlesInMenu').parent().html(renderLatestArticlesInMenu());
                                    });
                                </script>

                    <script type="text/javascript">
                        $(document).ready(function () {
                            $(".userbox").click(function (event) {
                                $('.search-box-form, .middle-header .search-box-form').hide();

                                $(".middle-header").removeClass("active");
                                if ($(".userbox").hasClass("logged")) {
                                    $(".user-info-header").hide();
                                    $(".loggedGigya").show();
                                }
                                else {
                                    $(".user-info-header").show();
                                    $(".loggedGigya").hide();
                                }
                                $(".userbox").toggleClass("activo");
                                $(".middle-header").addClass("active");
                                event.stopPropagation();
                            });
                            $(document).bind("click", function () {
                                if ($(".user-info-header").is(":visible") || $(".loggedGigya").is(":visible")) {
                                    $(".user-info-header").hide();
                                    $(".loggedGigya").hide();
                                    $(".userbox").removeClass("activo");
                                    $(".middle-header").removeClass("active");
                                }
                            });
                        });
                    </script><span class="btn-suscripcion"><a

                    </section>
                </div>
                <div id="m20-18-21">

                                            <article
                                                class="articleModule article_simple article-split article-no-image home-opinion-module "
                                                id="m178-177-179">
                                                <div class="articleModuleContent">
                                                    <div class="supratitle-container"></div>

                                                    <div class="article-details">
                                                        <h1 class="title" itemprop="headline"><span
                                                                class="titleIcon contenido-suscripcion"><svg
                                                                    class="icon-user-solid box-icon">

                                                                deterioro de la imagen de España</a></h1>
                                                        <div class="cont-bottom">

                        </div>
                    </section>
                </div>

                                                                class="article-title-link " id="m335-334-336"
                                                                href="/noticias/aragon/huesca/2023/02/17/huesca-trasladara-oficinas-municipales-a-tres-locales-cedidos-por-la-seguridad-social-1632083.html">Huesca
                                                                trasladará oficinas municipales a tres locales cedidos
                                                                por la Seguridad Social</a></h1>

                    <section>
                        <div class="board-board7">
                            <div class="board-title-container"></div>
                            <div class="board-content-container">
                                <div class="home-board board7 v4 " id="m25-24-26">
                                    <div class="box box1 box1x1_v2 flo-left ">
                                        <article class="articleModule article_simple img-left rec_v4 " id="m30-29-31">
                                            <div class="articleModuleContent">
                                                <div class="supratitle-container"></div>
                                                <div class="sponsored-container box-4-sponsored"></div>
                                                <div class="image-container">
                                                    <figure><a
                                                            href="/noticias/aragon/huesca/2023/02/17/la-piscina-almeriz-de-huesca-con-180-000-usos-al-ano-reabrira-el-bar-5-anos-despues-1632126.html"

                                                                src="https://imagenes.heraldo.es/files/image_234_v3/uploads/imagenes/2023/02/17/el-bar-de-la-piscina-almeriz-de-huesca-lleva-cinco-anos-cerrado.jpeg"

                                                    </figure><a
                                                        href="/noticias/aragon/huesca/2023/02/17/la-piscina-almeriz-de-huesca-con-180-000-usos-al-ano-reabrira-el-bar-5-anos-despues-1632126.html">

                                                                class="icon-camera-retro">
                                                                <use
                                                                    xlink:href="/images/henneo-icons.svg#icon-camera-retro">

                                                                xlink:href="/images/henneo-icons.svg#icon-heartbeat-alt">
                                                            </use>
                                                        </svg></span><span class="name-item">Salud</span></a></li>
                                            <li class="item-servicios"><a
                                                    href="https://tienda.heraldo.es/suscripcion-digital?utm_medium=servicios&utm_campaign=suscripcion&utm_source=heraldo.es"

            $(document).ready(function () {
                $(".otros-sitios").click(function (event) {
                    $(".col-pie-2").toggleClass("active");
                    $(".footer-last").toggleClass("active");

                    $(".otros-sitios .ui-caret-down").toggle();
                    $(".otros-sitios .ui-caret-up").toggle();

                    window.scrollTo(0, document.body.scrollHeight);
                });
            });
